info.name: privacyIDEA Two Factor Authentication
info.summary: Most flexible enterprise level multi factor authentication
info.description:
This is a plugin to forward authentication requests to your own privacyIDEA Authentication System. [Your own privacyIDEA Authentication System](https://netknights.it/en/produkte/privacyidea/) can run on premise centrally in your network under your control.
privacyIDEA can manage many different kind of authentication devices. Thus you can assign different authentication objects to your users as second factor. Users can now authenticate against your ownCloud installation with e.g. Google Authenticator, the [privacyIDEA Authenticator](https://netknights.it/en/produkte/privacyidea-authenticator-app/) Yubikey, U2F tokens, key fob, OTP display cards and much more.
